tool_description: Combines multiple correction suggestions from different tools, resolves conflicts, prioritizes changes, and creates a unified set of corrections for application.

conflict_resolution.description: How to handle conflicts: priority_based, conservative, or aggressive

max_corrections.description: Maximum number of corrections to include (1-100)

error_messages: Empty original text: Provide the original text for correction merging.
Invalid priority order: Include valid correction types [grammar, spelling, punctuation, structure, style, vocabulary].
Invalid conflict resolution: Use one of [priority_based, conservative, aggressive].
Invalid max corrections: Value must be between 1 and 100.
Malformed correction data: Corrections must be properly formatted strings.
usage: Provide original text and correction arrays from various tools, optionally set priority order and conflict resolution strategy. Returns unified, prioritized corrections.

merged_corrections.description: Final merged corrections in priority order

correction_positions.description: Character positions for each merged correction

total_corrections.description: Total number of corrections in merged set
